<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mixed Maneuver](/Feats.aspx?ID=6012) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 123 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

You leverage your knowledge of martial arts to mix different maneuvers together into a single flowing combination. Choose any two of [Grapple](/Actions.aspx?ID=2376), [Reposition](/Actions.aspx?ID=2379), [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380), and [Trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=2382). Attempt both of the attacks you chose against the same or different creatures, but don't apply the multiple attack penalty until after resolving both attacks.
name: Mixed Maneuver
